text: HeLa cells were cultured in Dulbecco's modified Eagle medium (DMEM) (Life Technologies, Carlsbad, CA) supplemented with 10% heat-inactivated FBS (Biological Industries, Israel), penicillin (100 U/ml), and streptomycin (0.1 mg/ml). Cells were incubated in 5% CO 2 at 37 â€¢ C and passaged every 24-48 h.
